lines.text: Are you kidding me with those glasses? You look like a child molester. Get rid off them or it's gonna be a short trial.
You draw pubic hair, didn't you?
I drew nipples there too, you see?
They say it ain't over until the fat lady sings. I think she already sung.
Put me in jail! I've been in your jail and I know what terrible places they are.
I'm not bittered. I was raised to not be bitter.
We lost everything. We don't have anything. Momma, we don't have anything.
Look the jury in the eye and answer this question. Did you ever molested a child?
